references: Repeals: Ord 92917; Related: CF C13894, Ord 88291
summary: An ordinance authorizing a settlement for damage to property at 9532 42nd Ave. Northeast resulting from the improvements under Local Improvement District No. 6204, and making an appropriation from any surplus funds in said L.I.D. No. 6204, and repealing Ordinance No. 92917.
